288722.「ふたりとも よく 来てくれた。\n ついに 天星郷にも 下界同様の\n 異変が:
Thank you both for coming. The strange goings
on of the lower world have finally made their
way to the Firmament.

288723.「天星郷の守りは かたいはず！\n いったい どうやって……。:
But the Firmament's defenses should be nigh
impenetrable! How could it...?

288724.「神にも等しい チカラを持つ 悪神ならば\n 造作もなかろう。みずからが 生みだ:
For a fiend with power rivaling that of a
god, it'd be quite easy. Ironic that they'd
bite the hand that fed them...

288725.「残る悪神は……アシュレイと レオーネ。\n どちらの しわざにせよ 動きだして:
The two remaining fiends are Ashley and Leone.
I'm relieved that they are finally making a
move, because I was getting tired of waiting.

288726.「今までの悪神とは 異なり\n 下界でなく 天星郷を 攻撃するだなんて\n 何を:
Unlike the other fiends we've encountered in
the lower world, they're attacking the
Firmament...what is their motive?

288727.「今は まだ なんとも……。\n わかってるのは 紺碧の試練場に\n 心域の入り:
We still don't know...all we do know is that
the entrance to their heartland has shown
itself inside the Azure Trial.

288728.「心域……悪神の心が 生みだす世界ですね。\n アシュレイか レオーネか……。\:
The heartland...a world created by the hearts
of those fiends. Is it Ashley's, or Leone's...?
I suppose we'll have to go and see ourselves.

288729.「よい心意気だ。お前たち ふたりには\n 悪神の火種を回収するため 新たな心域に:
That's the spirit. I want you to investigate
this new heartland and secure the Fiend's
Kindle. Will you do it?

288730.「異変の発生源は 紺碧の試練場に建つ\n 創世のピラーと呼ばれる 塔のような建造:
The source of the anomaly this time is a
tower-like structure called the Pillar of
Genesis, built in the Azure Trial.

288731.「この創世のピラーこそが\n 各々の試練場に エネルギーを供給する\n 施設と:
These Pillars of Creation are the facilities
that supply energy to the various trial
areas.

288732.「その最奥には 中心核と呼ばれる\n 膨大なエネルギーを生みだす 光る球体が\n:
In the deepest part, there is a floating, glowing sphere called the central core. It produces enormous amounts of energy...
and it's quite the beautiful sight to boot.

288733.「おっとっと すまん。話が それたな。\n じつは その創世のピラーの 入り口な:
Whoops, sorry. I'm getting off track here.
As it turns out, the entrance to that pillar
can only be accessed by those who can fly.

288735.「ああ 行けない。だから この際\n <pc>には 我々と同じように\n 空を飛:
Yeah, they can't go. That's why, I'd like them
to learn how to fly just like us.

288736.「天使でなくても 空を飛べるようになる\n 聖天のつばさ……という道具があってね:
There is a device called the "Wonderwing"
that will allow you fly even if you aren't an
angel.

288737.「まずは 深翠の試練場の 生誕の花園へ行き\n フェディーラから 聖天のつばさを:
First, go to the Garden of Growth in the Deep
Green Trial and get the Wonderwing from
Fedira. I've already filled her in.

288738.「空を飛べるようになったら ユーライザに\n 創世のピラーまで 導いてもらうとい:
Once you learn how to fly, Yuliza should be
able to lead you to the pillar.

288739.「戻ってきたか ふたりとも。\n 紺碧の試練場の異変は どうなった？:
You're back. So, what happened at the Azure

288740.<pc>は アシュレイの\n呪炎の切り離しに 失敗して\n逃げられてしまったと:
<pc> explained that their attempt
to sever the cursed flame from Ashley had
failed, and that he had escaped.

288741.「どういうわけか アシュレイには\n 神剣が効かず 刀身にも ヒビが入って……。:
For some reason, the divine sword didn't work
on Ashley, and its blade cracked...

288742.「ふむ どれ……。見せてもらおうか。: Hmm, I see...please show it to me.

288743.「アシュレイの 並ならぬ胆力が\n 神剣のチカラを 跳ね返したのかもしれんな。:
I wonder if it was Ashley's extraordinary
courage that was able to deflect this blade.

288744.「呪炎を表出させつつも まだ 持ち直すだけの\n 余力があったのだろう。次に奴と:
He most likely had enough strength to recover even while harboring the cursed flame. Next time you fight him, make sure you really
shatter his spirit.

288745.「そうすれば 呪炎を切り離せるはずだ。\n 刀身にヒビが入り 刃こぼれも ひどい:
You should be able to sever it if you do that.
The blade is cracked and pretty dulled, but I
think it'll still work. You should be fine.

288746.「近いうちに 修復せねばならんが アシュレイを\n 倒すまでは これで 乗り切っ:
I'll have to eventually get it fixed, but this
should tide you over until you can take him
down.

288747.「それより 問題なのは 紺碧の試練場だな。\n アシュレイは 創世のピラーの奥で:
But more importantly, at the Azure Trial...
What was Ashley doing inside of the Pillar?

288748.「次の報告が まさに その件です。\n アシュレイは 中心核のエネルギーを\n:
The following report is precisely that. Ashley

energy of the central core.

288749.「天井に浮かんでいる 光る球体が\n 見る間に しぼんでいって 小さくなり……。:
The glowing sphere floating on the ceiling
deflated and shrank as I watched...

288750.「な なんだと！？ それを早く言え！\n ヘタすると 浮力を失い\n 紺碧の試練:
What the hell? Tell me that quickly! If we
mess up, we could lose buoyancy and the Azure
Trials could fall.

288751.「前にも話したが 創世のピラーは 試練場を\n 維持するための エネルギーを生み:
As we've talked about before, the Pillars of
Creation generate energy to sustain the
trials. If that energy is taken away...

288752.「……かくなる上は 神都フォーリオンの\n 余剰エネルギーを 紺碧の試練場に回し:
Since this is the case, we will have no choice but to use the surplus energy of the Celestial City Fourion for the Azure Trials to make a
quick getaway.

288753.「この程度で とこしえの神殿の結界が\n 消えることは ないだろうが……。:
This will not be enough to remove the wards of
the Temple of Eternity...

288754.「とこしえの神殿……フォーリオン外郭の\n 北にある 建物ですよね。あの古びた神:
The Temple of Eternity...that is the building
to the north of Outer Fourion, right? Was that
old temple wired?

288755.「ああ。神代の遺構の次に 古い建物だからな。\n 天星郷の 歴史的な遺産なんだよ:
Oh. It is the second oldest building after Ancient Remains. It's a historical legacy of Heaven. If we don't take good care of it, our
ancestors will scold us.

288756.「それは さておき エネルギー関係のことは\n 専門外だしなぁ……。先代が くわ:
But aside from that, I'm not an expert in energy-related matters... since my predecessor had such knowledge, I'll go there and ask him
for help.

288757.「天使長。言づてなら 私たちが。: Archangel. If you say so, we will.

288758.「ん…そうか。なら お前たちに頼もう。: Hmm...okay. Then I'll ask you guys.

288759.「先代の天使長 ゲゼルマイン様に\n 神都の余剰エネルギーを 紺碧の試練場に\n:
Please inform the previous Archangel, Gezelmein-sama, that we would like to supply the surplus energy of the divine city to the
Azure Trials.

288760.「先代は 神都の中層にある 南東の高台に\n 居を構えておられる。ミトラーの名代:
His predecessor resides on the southeastern heights in the middle of the Divine City. If you tell them that you are Mitra's namesake,
they will let you in.

288761.「どうやら うまくいったようだね。\n なに……カオを見れば わかるよ。\n 先:
Looks like it worked. What... you can tell
from the face. I guess your predecessors
helped you out a lot, huh?

288762.「はい。ゲゼルマイン様だけでなく\n クリュトス様にも 助けていただきました。:
Yes. I am very grateful to Mr. Gezelmein as
well as Mr. Krutos for their help.

288763.「はっはっはっは！ クリュトスめ。\n 泡食って 制御室に 飛び込んできたのか。:
Ha ha ha! Krutos. You jumped into the control
room to eat the bubbles. Even his predecessors
did terrible things.

288764.「おっと すまん すまん。\n なんとも 先代らしいなと 思ってな。\n 天使長:
Oh, I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I just
thought it was so typical of my predecessor.
He was an odd one for an Archangel...

288765.「聖天舎の天使長は 数名の候補者から 投票で\n 選ばれるが……先代天使長の指名:
The Archangel of the monastery is chosen by a vote among several candidates, but I was nominated as a candidate by the previous head
of angels, so I had an advantage at that point.

288766.「私に 白羽の矢が立ったのは 天星郷の抱える\n とある 重要な課題を 解決に導:
I was proud that I had been chosen because I
had led Heaven to a solution to an important
issue.

288767.「ところが 私の功績は 先代しか知らぬ\n 機密事項ゆえ……あいつは くじ引きで:
However, my accomplishments are confidential,
known only to my predecessor, and there are
rumors that he was selected by a lottery...

288768.「不安になり 真偽を確かめるため 先代を\n 問い詰めたのだが はぐらかされるば:
I was worried, so I asked my predecessor to confirm the Truth, but he just kept dodging my questions, and the truth is still in the
dark...

288769.「本当に くじで決まったのかもな……ははっ。\n くじ運だけの とんだ ラッキー:
Maybe it really was decided by a

288771.「ミトラー様が 天使長になられたことは\n 天星郷にとって ラッキーな人選でした:
It was a lucky choice for Heaven to have you
as Archangel Mitra! Everyone was overjoyed at

288773.「まあ 皆に ラッキーだったと\n 思ってもらえるよう がんばろうかな。\n 先:
Well, I'll do my best to make everyone feel

288774.「大変です！ 天使長！\n 黄金の試練場に 心域が出現しました！:
Oh, my God! Archangel! The Heart Realm has

288775.「あなた方も いらしてたのですか。\n それなら 話が早い。:
So you are here too? Then, we can talk

288776.「新たな心域が 現れたのは 創世のピラーか？:
Is it the Pillar of Creation where the new

288778.「急がねば ならんな……黄金の試練場にある\n 輝きの草原の 創世のピラーに向か:
We must hurry to the Pillar of Creation in the

288875.「えっ 心域を抜けた……？: What? Have we left the heartland...?

288876.「光る球体が 浮いてる……。\n これが 天使長の言っていた 試練場の\n エネ:
That floating sphere...is that not the device

288877.「なんだよ 来るの早すぎだろ！\n もっと ゆっくり 味わうように\n 見てって:
Hey, hey...you're here way too soon!

288878.「おーし たらふく 食ったようだな。\n レオのもとに 帰りな。:
Good. Looks like you've had your fill.

288879.「試練場の エネルギーを奪って\n 何をやろうと しているんです！？:
What are you planning on doing with that

288880.「フン！ 教えてやる義理なんざ\n これっぽっちも ねえや。聞けば なんでも\n:
Hmph! I don't even have the slightest

288881.「そんなことより <cs_pchero>。\n まだ 俺が見せたいものの 半分し:
But that's not the point. <cs_pchero>.
You've only seen half of what I wanted to show
you. How about a temporary truce, yeah?

288882.「全部を 見届けた上で 俺とレオの\n 同志になるか お前に判断してほしい。\n:
I want you to see the whole thing 'till the end, and then decide if you wanna join up with me and Leo. It's important, so I don't

288883.「どんなものを 見せられようと\n この人は 悪神の同志には なりません！:
No matter what you show to <if_woman>her<else>him<endif>,
<if_woman>she<else>he<endif> will never join with a fiend!

288884.「……仕方ねえ。ここまで言って わからねえなら\n 一度 たたきのめして 言うこ:
Guess there's no convincing you...if you STILL don't get after everything I've told you, then I'll just have to beat it into you! That's what
champions do, after all!

288885.「……かなわねえなぁ。\n 当代の盟友は こんなにも 強いのか。\n 勇者をも:
I guess I'm no match for you...the present-day

288886.「今です！ 神剣で呪炎を！: Now! Use the sword on the cursed flame!

288887.「まだだ！ 一度 負けたくらいじゃ\n 勇者は 屈しないッ！:
I'm not...done yet! A Hero doesn't give in

288889.「俺はよぉ こんなとこで\n やられるわけにゃあ いかねえんだ！:
I'm not gonna let you beat me here!
No way!

288890.「レオの奴が お前を気に入っててさ。\n 兄ちゃんとしては なんとしても\n 弟:
That Leo really likes you, you know. As a big

288891.「そんなわけだからよぉ！\n ここは いったん 退かせてもらうぜ！:
So that's why...I'm gonna have to retreat

288892.「刀身にヒビが……。これまでの悪神なら\n 一撃のもとに 呪炎を切り離せたのに\:
The blade is cracked... It was able to sever the curse easily from the previous fiends we've encountered, but... Ashley is just on
a whole different level...

288893.「今は 一度 聖天舎に戻り\n この件もふくめて 天使長に報告しましょう。:
I think we should take this opportunity to

288894.「ゲゼルマイン様の おっしゃっていた\n 端末というのは これでしょうか……。\:
I wonder if this is the terminal that Mr.

288895.「えーと……まず 端末にくっついた ハンドルを\n 右回りに回転させれば 神都フ:

Fourion...

288900.<pc>は ハンドルを右回りに回転させ\n神都フォーリオンのエネルギーを 解放し:
<pc> turned the wheel clockwise,
unleashing the energies of the Celestial City
Fourion!

288901.「うまくいったようです！\n やりましたね <pc>！:
Looks like it worked! You did it
<pc>!

288902.「ん？ メモには 続きがあるようです……。\n しばらく待つと クリュトスが来る:
Hmm? The note seems to continue... wait a

288903.「はて？ ここで どうして\n クリュトス様の お名前が…………？:
Huh? How did I come across Mr. Krutos' name
here?

288904.「あなたたちッ！！\n そこで 何をやっているのです！: You guys! What are you doing there!

288906.<pc>は クリュトスに 紺碧の試練場の\nエネルギー不足のため 先代天使長の指:
informed Krutos that due to the lack of energy in the Azure Trials, he had followed the instructions of the previous
Archangel and released the energy of the Divine City.

288907.「はぁ……ゲゼルマイン様も 困ったものですね。\n 昔から あきれるほどの 面倒:
Gezelmein-sama is also a pain in the ass,
isn't he? He's always been so tiresome...

288908.「とはいえ ゲゼルマイン様の\n 一番弟子を 名乗るからには\n 協力しないわけ:
However, since you call yourself Gezelmein's
number one disciple, it's hard not to
cooperate...

288909.「ゲゼルマイン様のメモにも\n 書いてあったのですが\n クリュトス様は どうし:
I also read in Mr. Gezelmein's note that Mr.
Krutos was wondering why you are here.

288910.「天星郷全体の エネルギーの流れに\n 異常を 検知したからです。\n 正面のカ:
This is because we detected an anomaly in the

288911.「中央の光る水晶が 神都フォーリオンで\n その周辺に 配置された水晶は\n 各:
The glowing crystal in the center is the

placed around it are the various trial sites.

288912.「光の線が 上に伸びてるでしょう？\n これは 神都のエネルギーが 北にある\n:
See the ray of light extending upward? This is a sign that the energy of the capital city is being fed to the Temple of Eternity to the
north.

288913.「さっき あなたたちが やったのは\n 神都のエネルギーを すべての試練場に\n:
What you did just now was a manipulation to

the trial sites.

288914.「エネルギーが足りてる 試練場にまで\n 過剰なエネルギーが 流れ込み\n その:
It's enough energy that the trials are being

288915.「紺碧の試練場にだけ エネルギーを\n 供給したいなら まず 端末に\n 専用の:
If you want to supply energy only to Azure

288916.「たしか 作りかけの物が\n 倉庫にあったはず……少々 お待ちを。:
I think I have some in the works in the

288917.「これは 分光器といって 対象を選んで\n エネルギーを制御するための 器具なん:
This is a Spectrometer, an instrument that

288918.「でも 分光器の 内部にある水晶を\n 振動により 活性化させれば 起動できます:
But you can activate it by vibrating the
crystal inside the Spectrometer. First, I'd

288920.「分光器を持った状態で フォーリオン造成地の\n 北東の浮島などに 生息している:
With the Spectrometer in your hand, defeat the
three Spirit Flames that live on the floating
islands northeast of Fourion Created Land.

288921.「スピリットフレイムの放つ\n 生体エネルギーの波長が 分光器の水晶を\n 振動:
The wavelengths of bioenergy emitted by Spirit Flame vibrate the crystals in the Spectrometer, bringing it into an operational
state.

288922.「造成地の 北東の浮島などにいる\n スピリットフレイムを ３匹ですね？\n 急:
Three Spirit Flames on a floating island
northeast of the site? Let's hurry up and get
them out of here.

288923.「クリュトス様。ご指示どおり\n 分光器を 再起動させました。:
Dear Mr. Krutos. I have reactivated the
Spectrometer as you instructed.

288924.「ありがとうございます。\n では 分光器を こちらに。:
Thank you very much. Now, I have the
Spectrometer right here.

288926.「……感謝のエネルギーだけでなく\n クリュトス様は フォーリオン全体の\n エ:
...Not only Gratitude Energy, but Mr. Krutos
knows a lot about the energetic relations of
Fourion as a whole.

288927.「ヘルヴェルお姉様にしても 戦技に優れた方だし\n 審判の天使になる方々は どな:
Even Sister Helvel is an excellent fighter,
and all of the angels of judgement have
outstanding qualities...

288928.「ずば抜けた長所……ですか。ふふっ。\n じつは 何もかも ただの偶然なんですよ:
Outstanding merit...? Hmmm. Actually,
everything is just a coincidence.

288929.「昔 商人に扮して 下界を視察してきた\n 先代から 大量のゴールドを\n 押し:
I was once forced to pay a huge amount of gold
by my predecessor, who came to inspect the

means taking your sister's life.

289054.「……仕方ない。ヘルヴェルの同行を \n 許可する。神剣の修復 急げよ。:
I have no choice. I'll allow Helvel to
accompany you. Restore the sacred sword.
Hurry.

289055.「フフ…言うようになったな ユーライザ。\n おかげで 外の空気が吸える。:
Fufu...you're getting to say that, Yuliza.
Thanks to you, I can get some air.

289056.「神剣を 修復するための 装置だが\n 白灰の試練場の中心核の間に しまってある:
The device used to restore the sacred sword is
tucked away in the central core of the White
Ash Hall Trial Room.

289057.「それなら 白灰の試練場の 試みの荒野にある\n 創世のピラーの根元から 入れま:
Then we can enter at the base of the Pillar of
Creation in the Wilderness of Trials in the
White Ash Trials. Let's get going.

289058.「これが 聖天のレンズだ。４つの試練場の\n 創世のピラーを 生成したときに使っ:
This is the Lens of the Holy Heaven, used to generate the Pillars of Creation in the four trials. It is also the treasure of the Lady
Lutiana.

289059.「時間は かかるが 本体よりも\n はるかに巨大な物を 生みだせる。\n 無論:
It takes time, but it can produce something
much larger than the body itself. Even
something as small as a sword, of course.

289060.「ルティアナ様は こんな すばらしい物を\n 天星郷に 残してくださったのですね:
Lady Lutiana left such a wonderful thing in
Heaven...

289061.「聖天のレンズだけではない。\n アストルティアの楯も また\n ルティアナ様が:
It is not only the lens of the Holy Heaven.
The Shield of Astoltia was also created by
Lutiana.

289063.「……奇妙な物言いだな。\n アストルティアの楯は この世界を守護する\n 大結:
That's a strange thing to say. I have heard that the Shield of Astoltia is a hidden treasure that creates a great ward to Guard
this world.

289064.「だからこそ 神殿の奥に まつられ\n その存在すらも 一部の者をのぞいて\n:
That is why it is hidden in the back of the
temple, and even its existence is not open to
the public, except to a few.

289065.「まあ 私も 実物を見たことは ないがな……。\n 楯が奉納されている とこしえ:
Well, I have never seen it myself, but the Temple of Eternity where the shield is dedicated is protected by a strong ward and is
inaccessible.

289066.「でも 今は 結界が解かれてます。: But now the warding is lifted.

289068.「楯が 狙われているにせよ エネルギー不足に\n おちいった 試練場を維持するた:
Even though the shield was targeted, it was unavoidable in order to maintain the trial site, which was running low on energy...so
they unbundled the temple.

289069.「代わりに 天使長は みずから\n 神殿の防衛に 向かわれました。:
Instead, the Archangel went to the defense of
the temple on his own.

289070.「天使長ならば 悪神とも\n 互角に 渡り合えるだろうが……。\n これは 急い:
Archangel could go toe-to-toe with the fiends,
but I think we'd better hurry.

289071.「<pc>。聖天のレンズに向かって\n 神剣を かかげてくれ。:
<pc>. Hold up the divine sword to the
lens of the Holy Heaven.

289072.「たとえ 壊れた物であっても\n 聖天のレンズが 完璧に再生してくれよう。:
Even if the object is broken, the lens of the
Holy Heaven will perfectly reconstruct it.

289073.「これなら すぐにでも\n 天使長の応援に 向かえますね！！:
This way I can head out to cheer on the
Archangel right away!

289074.「……そうカンタンには いかないようだ。\n 神剣レクタリスの 再生には\n レ:
...It seems that it is not that easy. It seems
that four Lecta Ore are required to regenerate
the Divine Sword Lectalis.

289075.「どこで 手に入るんです？\n 私たちが 急いで採ってきます。:
Where can I get some? We'll go get them as
soon as we can.

289076.「……ふたりで行く気か？\n カンティスに ああ言った手前\n 私を ひとりにし:
Are you two going alone? After what you said
to Kantis, you shouldn't leave me alone.

289077.「すまないが ここは お前に頼むとしよう。\n これに レクタ鉱石を入れてきてく:
I'm sorry, but I'm going to have to ask you to
do it. Go put some Lecta Ore in this.

289079.「レクタ鉱石は フォーリオン造成地で採れる。\n 採り方は メドナムという天使を:
Lecta Ore can be found in the Fourion Created
Land. To find it, look for an angel named
Mednam and ask him.

289080.「お帰りなさい <pc>。\n レクタ鉱石 採れたみたいですね。:
Welcome back <pc>. Lecta Ore It looks
like you were able to pick it.

289081.「ご苦労だった。聖天のレンズの前で\n 鉱石の入ったバッグを かかげてくれ。:
Thank you. Please hold up the bag of ore to
the lens of the Holy Heaven.

289082.「一瞬で 完成というわけには\n いかないようですね……。:
It seems it can't be completed in an
instant...

289083.「……ジア・クトとは なんなのです？\n クリュトス様も カンティス様も\n 禁:
What is Dia Kut? Master Krutos and Master
Kantis both said it was a forbidden name.

289085.「お前たちは 知っておくべきだろうな。\n この身は すでに 罪にまみれている。:
You should know. I am already in sin. Now I
will break one more prohibition.

289087.「はい。たしか 遠い遠い昔に\n 大災害にみまわれて 脱出してきたんですよね？:
Yes, sir. You escaped from a catastrophe a
long, long time ago, right?

289088.「その 大災害の元凶が\n ジア・クト念晶体と呼ばれる 侵略者……。\n 祖先の:
The source of that catastrophe is an invader
called the Dia Kut telecrystals...those who
laid waste to the homelands of our ancestors.

289089.「今は 神代の遺構と呼ばれる かつての神都に\n ジア・クトの爪痕が 残されてい:
Now called Ancient Remains, the former divine
city bears the scars of Dia Kut.

289090.「あそこに漂う 猛毒の赤い霧は\n ジア・クトによるものだ。数万年もの\n 時を:
The poisonous red mist floating there is
caused by Dia Kut. Even after tens of
thousands of years, it has not disappeared.

289091.「アルビデを 支配するのに使った石や\n 悪神の火種は 神代の遺構の 赤い霧が漂:
The stones and Fiend's Flame used to control
Albide could only have grown in that red mist
of Ancient Remains...

289092.「お姉様は 収穫した悪神の火種を\n レオーネに渡したと 言ってましたよね？\n:
You said that your sister gave the harvested
Fiend's Flame to Leone, right? Could it be
that Dia Kut is who he says he is?

289093.「そう 早まるものではないよ。つい 最近\n 肉体を得たばかりのレオーネが すべ:
Not so fast. Leone, who has only recently
taken flesh, is too well prepared to have
planned all this...

289094.「ほかにも 協力者がいたとか……。: I heard there were other collaborators.

289095.「今の揺れ……イヤな予感がしますね。\n レオーネが 動きだしたのでは……。:
The shaking now...I have a bad feeling about
this. I think Leone might be making a move...

289096.「奴が とこしえの神殿を\n 強襲したのかも しれん。: He may have raided the Temple of Eternity.

289097.「ふたりは とこしえの神殿へ行き\n 天使長を お助けしろ。:
You two, go to the Temple of Eternity and help
the Archangel.

289098.「そんな！ まだ 神剣が\n 直っていないのに。:
Oh no! The sacred sword hasn't been repaired
yet.

289099.「今は 一刻も早く 加勢に向かうべきだ。\n レオーネは これまでの悪神と 何か:
Now we must move quickly to join him. There is
something different about Leone from the
previous fiends. Be on your guard.

289100.「神剣は 完成しだい 必ず届ける。\n 私を信じてくれ。:
As soon as the sacred sword is complete, I
will deliver it to you. Trust me.

289103.<pc>と ユーライザは\n資材倉庫を出て 白灰の試練場を後にし\nフォーリオン:
<pc> and Yuliza left the material
storage, left the White Ash Trials, and headed
for the Outer Fourion.

289104.「奥に見えるのが とこしえの神殿です。\n 天使長たちが 守りを固めているので\:
The Temple of Eternity can be seen in the back. The Archangel and his men are guarding the temple, so even Leone won't be able to
break through easily...

289106.「とこしえの神殿に通じる 転送の門は\n 外郭の北側。ちょうど ここから\n 見:
The Relay Gate leading to the Temple of
Eternity is on the north side of the outer
wall. It can be seen from here. Let's hurry!

289109.「そうです。戦務室の精鋭で 守りを固めれば\n 防ぎきれると 踏んでいたのですが:
That's right. I thought that with the elite of the barracks and a strong defense, we'd be able to prevent them, but they were stronger
than I imagined...

289110.「……天使長は 神殿の最奥にある\n 楯を奉納した部屋を 死守してます。\n 僕:
The Archangel is guarding the room dedicated
to the shield at the far end of the temple. We
must go after Leone.

289111.「ムチャしないでください！\n 私たちで 行きますから。:
Please don't do anything rash! We'll go
ourselves.

289112.「おふたりは 負傷した者たちを連れ\n 聖天舎へ お戻りください。:
The two of you should return to the monastery
with the wounded.

289113.「ふがいない 審判の天使で 申し訳ない。\n ですが 頼みます。楯が 壊されでも:
I apologize for being such a poor angel of judgement. But I ask you. I don't know what kind of disaster would ensue if the shield
were to be broken.

289114.「わかっています。\n ジア・クトの 脅威ですよね？: I understand. The threat of Dia Kut, right?

289116.「私からも お願いします。この奥でレオーネと\n 戦っている天使長に 加勢してく:
I ask you to do the same. Please join the
Archangel who is fighting Leone back here. And
defend the Shield of Astoltia.

289118.「あの石像は レオーネの……？\n ここに来て またも\n 心域に はばまれるな:
Is that a statue of Leone? I can't believe
we're here and we're blocked in the psychic
area again.

289119.「どうやら 何か しかけがあるようです。\n 先に進みたければ 解くしかなさそう:
There seems to be some kind of mechanism. If
you want to go on, you'll have to solve it.

289120.「ひとりでは 分が悪かろう。\n おとなしく アストルティアの楯を渡すなら\n:
It's not a good idea to go it alone. I will
not take your life if you will surrender the
Shield of Astoltia quietly.

289121.「あれを 奪われれば\n アストルティアは 滅んだも同然だ！: If they take it, Astoltia is as good as dead!

289122.「そうか。ならば ここで死ぬんだな。: I see. Then this is where you die.

289123.「もう 追いついたのか。\n 予想より だいぶ 早かったな。:
You've already caught up. That was much faster
than I expected.

289125.「……こんな奴の相手を\n しているヒマなど ないというのに！: I don't have time to deal with this guy!

289126.「<cs_pchero>！ 速攻で 倒しましょう！:
<cs_pchero>! Let's take them down as fast as
we can!

289128.「神剣でないと ダメだというの……？: Are you saying it has to be a sacred sword...?

289131.「間に合って よかった。: I'm glad I made it in time.

289133.「……悪神の火種です。\n レオーネは これで 手下の魔物を\n 強化していたよ:
...Fiend's Flame. It seems that Leone was
using this to strengthen the monsters under
his control.

289134.「手下か……。レオーネとの決着は\n まだ ついてないようだな。\n ここから先:
It seems that you and Leone haven't settled
your differences yet. I'll join you from here
on out.

289135.「そんな！ まだ 戦えるような身体では……。: Oh, no! I'm not fit to fight.

289136.「……汚名返上の 機会をくれ。\n アルビデを 死なせてしまったことへの\n つ:
Give me a chance to clear my name. It's my way
of saying good-bye for letting Albide die.

289231.「創世のピラーには 審判の天使以外\n 立ち入りを 禁じられており\n 私も 中:
The Pillars of Creation are forbidden to all
except the Angels of Judgment, so this is
the first time I've been inside one.

289232.「さっそく 心域に入ったようですね……。\n アシュレイ レオーネ……いったい:
Looks like we've already entered the heartland
of...Ashley...? Leone...? Which one of yours
is it?

289233.「それに あの人たち……いえ 人形？: And those people...no, are they dolls...?

289234.「ようこそ 我が心域に。\n お前たちが来るのを 待ちわびたぞ。:
Welcome to my heartland. We have been
expecting you.

289235.「あー 待て 待て。\n ムダな体力を使うのは よしたほうがいい。\n 今 見え:
Ah, hang on, hang on! I wouldn't waste your
energy. What you're seeing now is just an
illusion. An illusion!

289236.「わざわざ こんな おもてなしをするのは\n お前に 生前の俺を 知ってほしいか:
The reason I'm going out of my way to be all
hospitable is 'cuz I want you to know what
I was like before I died.

289237.「この先 起こることを よ～く見て お前には\n 俺とレオーネの 同志になっても:
I want you to watch reeeeal careful what's
about to happen next, and become comrades
with me and Leone.

289238.「よくも ぬけぬけと！ <pc>が\n 悪神の一味に 加わるようなことなど\n:
How dare you?! You're crazy if you think
<pc> will join together with
a fiend!

289239.「ハン！ あんたが どんなに ほえようと\n 俺を倒したかったら 心域の先まで\:
Hmph! No matter how much you talk, you'll have
to go all the way to the depths of my heart to
defeat me! While seeing my past!

289240.「てなわけで 初代勇者の昔話の 始まり始まり～\n 遠い遠い昔 レンダーシアの:
And so begins the tale of the first Hero from
long, long ago...in a place called Lendersia,
there existed two tribes: Zedra and Reviewle.

289241.「俺とレオーネは ゼドラ族の 族長の子として\n 生まれたんだが しあわせな子供:
Me and Leone were born as children of the
Zedra tribe's chief, but our happy childhood
came to skidding halt...just like this.

289243.「アシュレイも レオーネも\n 腹を痛めて産んだ 大切な我が子。\n どちらかを:
Both Ashley and Leone are my precious children
born after much hardship. You can't seriously
suggest putting one up for adoption, can you?!

289244.「お前が生んだ勇者は 双子であった。\n 部族の均衡を はかるため どちらかを\:
The Hero you gave birth to has a twin. In order to balance both tribes, one must be adopted into the Reviewle tribe. This is a
divine decree.

289245.「双方が 勇者を いただくようになれば\n いさかいの絶えぬ レビュール族と\n:
If both sides are to accept both Heroes, there
may finally be hope of reconciliation between
ever-feuding Zedra and Reviewle.

289246.「部族のため！ ひいては 人類のため！\n すべては グランゼニス神の導きのまま:
It is for our tribe, and ultimately for all of
humanity! All under the guidance of the
great Gran Zenith...

289247.「この巫女の ばあさんのせいで\n まだ 幼かった 俺とレオーネは\n 離れ離れ:
Thanks to this old maiden, me and Leone were
separated at a very young age.

289248.「巫女ってのは 大魔王が襲ってくるとか\n 勇者が生まれるとか……そういう\n:
A maiden is supposed to announce the prophecies of the gods to everyone...like when the Great Demon King is supposed to attack
or when a Hero will be born, for example.

289249.「俺とレオを 引き離すのも 神の預言である\n とか 言われりゃあ 逆らえる奴な:
When she claimed it was a prophecy to separate
me from Leo, there wasn't a single person who
could object...

289250.「これを機に レオは レビュール族の\n 族長の家に 預けられちまった。\n 俺:
As a result, Leo was sent to live with the
Reviewle's chief. I was raised here with the
Zedra tribe.

289251.「まだ このころは レオーネも\n 勇者と 呼ばれてたんだっけ……。:
Leone was still called a Hero back then too,
wasn't he...

289252.「<pc>。俺は 心域の先で待ってる。\n そのときに もう一度 同志になるか\:
. I'll be waiting further inside this heartland. That's when I'll ask you again if you wanna be my comrade or
not.

289253.「自身の記憶を 見せていくことで\n あなたを 取り込もうとするなんて……。\n:
The way he's trying to get you to join him by
showing you his own memories...none of the
other fiends have done anything like this.

289254.「……不可解ですが\n 今は 先へ進むとしましょう。:
It's quite baffling, but...
For now, let's just move on.

289255.「遅い！ 私を待たせるな！: Too slow! You shouldn't keep me waiting!

289256.「……レオは レビュールの集落から\n 通ってんだぞ 師匠。ちょっとくらい\n:
Leo has to come all the way from Reviewle's
village... Don't go off scolding us just
'cause we're a little late.

289257.「実戦なら 死んでいたぞ。\n 大魔王に 言い訳など通じぬ！:
If this were a real fight, you'd be dead!
The Great Demon King doesn't care about
your excuses!

289258.「実戦なら 死んでたぜ 師匠。:
If this were a real fight, you'd be dead,
Master.

289259.「フン！ ついに このガーニハンから\n １本 取りおったか。:
Hmph! Looks like you were finally able to
best me just once...

289260.「おお 参られたか。どうぞ こちらに。: Oh, you're here! Please, come this way.

289261.「勇者アシュレイに 勇者レオーネ。\n お初に お目にかかります。:
Ashley and Leone, the two Heroes...
It's a pleasure to meet you both.

289262.「巫女見習いの ダフィアと申します。\n 本日より 修練に参加させていただきます:
My name is Dafia, and I am a maiden
apprentice. I will be joining your training
starting today, so I hope we can get along.

289263.「ダフィア様は 次代の巫女として 長年\n ソーラリア峡谷のグランゼニス宮で 過:
As part of the next generation of maidens, Dafia has spent many years at Gran Zenith's Palace in the Solaria Canyon, studying hard
to master her spiritual ability.

289264.「呪文のウデ前も 相当なものだ。\n 大魔王討伐のおりには 頼もしい戦力として\:
Her skill in the spell is also commendable.
She will be a valuable asset to us in
defeating the Great Demon King.

289265.「本当に そっくりですのね。\n 私 双子を見るのは 初めてで。:
They really do look alike...
This is the first time I've ever seen twins.

289269.「まだ 道が続いてるようです。\n 先へ 進んでみましょう。:
It looks like we still have a ways to go.
Let's keep going.

289270.「……いよいよだな。\n ここから先は 死出の旅路。:
It's finally here... From here on, it'll be
a journey of life or death.

289271.「景気ワリィこと 言うなよ。\n 大魔王を倒して 帰ってくんだろ？:
Why do you gotta be so negative? You're gonna
defeat the Great Demon King and come back,
right?

289272.「この陣地を築くのにも 多くの犠牲を払った。\n 大魔王が根城とする ドラクロン:
Many lives were sacrificed to build this stronghold. The Demon King's fortress in the Draklon Mountains is bound to have even
stronger defenses...

289273.「たとえ 道半ばで果てようと\n 人助けこそ お前たちの 本分であろう。:
"Even if we meet our end halfway through,
helping others is our true purpose."

289274.「なぜなら 勇者なのだから……ってか？\n 先代巫女の クチぐせだったな。\n:
"Because you are Heroes..." The last maiden used to say that, didn't she? If we die, does that mean we're free from all this
responsibility?

289275.「だから そう 悲観的になるなって。\n お前の悪いクセだ。気楽にいこうぜ。\n:
You shouldn't get all pessimistic now. That's
your bad habit, you know. Let's just take it
easy and go hunting in the mountains.

289276.「なら 準備は しっかり ととのえませんとね。:
Then...we should make sure we're well
prepared.

289277.「おう。アンタからも 言ってやってくれ。\n レオが 景気ワリィこと 言ってんだ:
Hey. You should talk to him, too. Leo's acting
all gloomy, like he's on a one-way trip to
death. It's a real drag, ya' know.

289278.「現実的な分析 だろ？: It's just being realistic, you know?

289279.「レオーネの 言うように\n 勝ち目は うすいかもしれません。:
As Leone says...our odds of success may be
slim.

289281.「ですが 加護を得れば 勝算も上がりましょう。\n おふたりに お守りを用意しま:
But your chances should improve with my
blessing. I've prepared a charm for the both
of you. Please take them.

289283.「感謝するぜ！ でもよ グランゼニス神の\n 加護だったら 期待できねえぞ。\n:
Thanks a bunch! But if it's a blessing from
Gran Zenith, I wouldn't hold my breath...
He's snoozing somewhere, isn't he?

289284.「神の加護ではなく 私の加護です。\n 手作りですから。:
It's not his blessing, it's mine. I made it
all by myself.

289285.「ガーニハン様も お守りをどうぞ。:
Master Ganihan, I'd like you to take a charm
too.

289286.「ふむ いただきましょう。: Of course. I'd be happy to.

289287.「師匠にも あるのかよ！: There's one for the Master too?!

289288.「ずいぶん ほほえましい 記憶ですね。\n けれど 内容からして この次は\n:
Quite the heartwarming memory, don't you agree? But from what we've seen already, it looks like the battle with the Great Demon
King is coming next...

289289.「アシュレイの思惑に 乗せられているようで\n シャクですが……そこで 何があっ:
It feels like we're just being strung along
with Ashley's plan, but...I am still curious
to see what's to happen.

289290.「大魔王ゴダ！！ てめえの命\n 散っていった同胞の たむけにしてやる！:
Great Demon King Goda! I'll make sure you pay
dearly for the lives of our fallen comrades!

289291.「アストルティアに 攻めてきたのが\n てめえの運の尽きだ！:
Your luck ran out as soon as you decided to
invade Astoltia!

289293.「わかってないだ……？\n 魔族の事情なんか 知るか。:
Understand nothing...? Like I care what a
demon thinks!

289294.「闇の深淵にうごめく 始源のかいなよ……\n 今こそ 我に チカラをっ！！:
The origin of darkness itself, the Great Abyss
of Darkness that stirs...
Give your power to me!!

289295.「……アストルティアの民に\n 魔界の怒りと怨念を 知らしめるため\n 勇者には:
The people of Astoltia shall know the wrath
and hatred of the Demon World...and its
Hero shall lead the charge.

289298.「全員を道連れにしようとは 欲張りだな。\n 老いぼれの命だけで がまんせい。:
You got too greedy, wanting to take everyone
along. You'll just have to make due with this
old man's life.

289300.「……つかの間の平和を 楽しむがいい。\n いつの日か 我に続く 第二 第三の大:
Enjoy your temporary peace while it still lasts... One day, a second or even third Demon King will take my place, and threaten this
land once more.

289302.「レ レオーネ！？\n おい ウソだろ……どういうことだ！\n なんだって こん:
L...Leone?! Hey, this can't be...what is going
on?! How could this happen...?!

289304.「ええ……黒い手のような物から\n レオーネが 守ってくれたのです。:
Yes...Leone protected me from something that
looked like a black hand.

289305.「俺らが助かって なんで レオだけが……。: But why were we saved, and Leo was...

289306.「死にぎわの 大魔王の言葉からして\n 呪い……かもしれません。:
Perhaps it's a curse...judging from the Great
Demon King's dying words...

289307.「勇者に呪いあれ…ってやつか。\n じゃあ なんで 俺だけ無事なんだ？\n ワケ:
He said "Curse you, Hero", didn't he...?
Then why am I the only one who was left
untouched...? I don't get it...

289308.「……痛ましい光景でしたが\n 英雄と呼ばれるほどの者は 誰しも\n 親しい者の:
What a tragic scene...but anyone who's ever
been called a Hero has had to endure the death
of someone close to them.

289309.「アシュレイともあろう者が その痛みを\n 克服できなかったとは 思いがたい……:
It's hard to believe that someone of Ashley's
demeanor wasn't able to overcome that pain...

289310.「ん……まだ 先があるようですね。\n 気をつけて進みましょう <pc>。:
Mmm...looks like we've still a ways to go.
Let's proceed with care.

289311.「あの石像……もしや 大魔王との戦いで\n 石にされてしまった レオーネでしょう:
That stone statue...could it be Leone who was
turned to stone in the battle with Great Demon
King?

289312.「母上……また このような場所に。\n 夜は冷えます。お部屋に お戻りください。:
Mother...again in a place like this. It gets
cold at night. Please go back to your room.

289313.「お前のほうこそ こんな冷たい場所に\n 弟を置いておいて なんとも 思わぬのか:
Don't you think anything of leaving your
brother in such a cold place? Leone is your
brother.

289314.「強力な 解呪のチカラを持つとされる\n 巫女の秘薬さえ 効き目がなかった……。:
Even the miko's potion, said to be powerful
enough to break the spell, was ineffective...

289315.「なんて 不憫な子だろう……。\n 養子になんか 出したばっかりに。:
What a pity she is... I can't believe I gave
her up for adoption.

289317.「失礼ながら……養子といえども\n 義弟は レビュール族の 族長の子として\n:
With all due respect, my brother-in-law, though adopted, was raised without distinction from me as the son of the chief of the
Reviewle tribe.

289318.「おお トランブル将軍……\n わらわは何も おぬしら レビュール族を\n 悪く:
Oh, General Trumbull...I have nothing against
you, nor do I mean to speak ill of the
Reviewle people.

289319.「ええ わかりますとも。レビュールも ゼドラも\n アシュレイ王が治める ゼドラ:
Yes, I understand. Both Reviewle and Zedra are
subjects of the Kingdom of Zedra, ruled by
King Ashley.

289321.「独立派に 動きが……。\n 皆 広間で お越しを待ってます。:
The Independents are on the move and they are
all waiting for you in the hall.

289322.「あなたは 軍議があるのでしょう？\n お義母様の お相手なら 私が。:
You have a military agenda, don't you? If you
want to see your mother-in-law, I'll do it.

289323.「薬学の進歩は 目覚ましいものがあります。\n いつの日か レオーネの呪いも 解:
The progress in pharmacology is remarkable.
Someday the curse of Leone will be lifted.

289324.「でも 大魔王の 呪いなのだろう？\n そんな すさまじいものを 消せるのかえ？:
But it's the Great Demon King's curse, isn't
it? Can you make such a tremendous thing
disappear?

289325.「私と夫は 大魔王ゴダに 打ち勝ちました。\n 呪いにも 必ずや 打ち勝ちます。:
My husband and I have defeated the Great Demon
King Goda. We will surely overcome the curse
as well.

289326.「さあ お身体に さわります。\n そろそろ お部屋の方へ……。:
Now, I'm going to touch you. I think it's time
to go to your room...

289327.「あの やんちゃだった アシュレイが\n 国王に……。歳月は 人を変えますね。:
That naughty Ashley is now the king...age
changes people, doesn't it?

289328.「一見 平和そうに見えますが\n どうにも きな臭い気がします。\n ……先を急:
At first glance, it looks peaceful, but there
is something fishy about it. Let's move on.

289329.「城下町で こうも立て続けに\n 暴動が起きようとは……。:
I never thought we'd see so many riots in a
row in the castle town...

289330.「組織立った動きに 見える。\n 何者かが 扇動しているようだな。:
It appears to be an organized movement. It
looks like someone is instigating this.

289331.「おお アシュレイ！\n 大変なことになったぞえ。: Oh, Ashley! You're in big trouble.

289332.「母上！ お話なら のちほど。\n 今は 火急の時なのです。:
Mother! We'll talk later. This is an urgent
time.

289333.「レオーネを いったい どこへやった？\n あの部屋から レオーネが いなくなっ:
Where the hell did they take Leone? Leone is
missing from that room. Did you move her
somewhere else?

289335.「武器を手にした 暴徒たちが\n レビュールに国家を！ と叫びながら\n 城門前:
Armed mobs have taken over the Nation in
Reviewle! They are gathering at the plaza in
front of the castle gate, shouting.

289336.「手勢を率いて 俺が出る。: I'll go out with a force.

289337.「失礼ながら 陛下。\n おんみずからの ご出陣は 時期尚早かと。:
With all due respect, Your Majesty. I think
it's premature for you to go on your own.

289338.「ええい！ トランブル将軍は まだか！\n 国家の 一大事ぞ！:
Hey! Where's General Trumbull? This is a
matter of national importance!

289340.「神聖レビュール王国の\n 国王を名乗る者から 書状が届きました。:
I received a letter from someone claiming to
be the King of the Holy Kingdom of Reviewle.

289341.「勇者レオーネの像は 奪還した。レビュール族の\n 誇りたる レオーネを 城の置:
The statue of Leone the Hero has been recovered. Your treatment of Leone, the pride of the people of Reviewle, as a memento of the
castle has ignited our anger.

289342.「加えて レビュール族を ないがしろにし\n 国政の場から弾き出す 暗愚の王アシ:
In addition, we'll unite in blood to bring down the oppressive regime of Ashley, the king of darkness, who neglects the Reviewle people
and excludes them from the national political arena.

289343.「神聖レビュール王国 初代国王……トランブル。:
Holy Kingdom of Reviewle, First
King...Trumbull.

289344.「トランブルが 暴動の首謀者だと！？: Trumbull was the ringleader of the riot?

289345.「手の空いてる部隊を まとめて\n 広場を囲むように 配置しなおせ。\n なんと:
Take all available units and reposition them
to surround the plaza. Do whatever it takes to
keep the mob at bay.

289346.「各部隊は 持ち場にて待機。\n 相手が暴徒でも こちらからは\n 絶対に 手を:
All units stand by at your posts. Even if the
other party is a rioter, do not touch them.

289347.「……俺は どこで まちがえたんだ？\n 部族の統一など 夢物語だったのか！？:
Where did I go wrong? Was it just a dream to
unite the tribes?

289348.「弱気にならないで くださいまし。\n 大魔王を倒した あなたは\n どこへ い:
Please don't be so timid. Where did you go
after defeating the Great Demon King?

289349.「あのときは 魔物や 魔族が相手だった。\n 今度の敵は 同じ人間だぞ。:
That time, we were dealing with monsters and
demons. This time, we're dealing with humans.

289350.「なんと 弱気な！ 己の連れ合いが\n 弱者だと 感じることぐらい\n ゾッとす:
How weak! Is there anything more horrifying
than to feel that your companion is weak?

289351.「前向きに 考えるのです。\n 今こそ 盤石なる国家を作る またとない\n 機会:
Think positively. This is a unique opportunity
to build a strong nation. We must bring down
the hammer on the traitors.

289352.「大魔王という 脅威が去った時代では\n 世を治め 民を導くのが 勇者の使命。\:
In an age when the threat of the Great Demon King has passed, it is the mission of Hero to rule the world and lead his people. No, it is
our destiny!

289353.「せっかく 魔界からの侵略を 退けたのに……。\n 人間同士の争いを見ると 心が:
After having fought off the invasion from
Demon World, it pains me to see humans
fighting each other.

289354.「世の乱れこそ 英雄を生む 源泉と言えますが\n そこに生きる人たちにとっては:
The turbulence of the world is the
fountainhead of heroism, but for those who
live in it, it is a tragedy.

289355.「まだ 先があるようです。\n 心して進みましょう。:
It seems we still have a long way to go. Let's
move forward mindfully.

289357.「死人が 出過ぎた。\n どちらかの王が 倒れるまで\n 決着は つくまいよ……:
There have been too many deaths. It will not
be settled until one of the kings falls.

289358.「和平の道を 探るんだ。\n 俺たちの手で……。:
We have to find a way to make peace. With our
own hands...

289359.「和平だと？ 貴様は つくづく\n 統治者には 不向きなようだな。\n 問題の根:
Peace? You are definitely not fit to be a
ruler. You don't even see the root of the
problem!

289360.「部族の統一を うたいながら ぬけぬけと\n 自分たちの名だけを 国名に残し……: How dare you! How dare you mock us, Reviewle!

289361.「それに飽き足らず みずからを\n 唯一無二の 勇者であると 詐称することで\n:
Unsatisfied with this, he tried to monopolize the achievement of defeating the Great Demon King by passing himself off as the one and
only Hero...

289362.「勇者レオーネを 盟友などという\n でっちあげの地位に おとしめることでな！:
By entrapping the Hero Leone into a fabricated
position of ally!

289363.「勇者の片割れが 呪いで石と成り果て\n 大魔王に屈したなどという 不名誉。\n:
The disgrace of having one half of Hero turned to stone by a curse and succumbed to the Great Demon King. I cannot leave such a thing to
posterity!

289364.「へ理屈をこねるな！ 誰が納得するかッ！\n 火種は つねに くすぶっていた。\:
Don't try to reason with me! Who's going to be
convinced? The spark was always smoldering.
That's why you're the king of fools!

289365.「頼む！ 剣をおろしてくれ！\n レオーネの義兄を 手にかけたくない！:
Please! Put the sword down! I will not lay a
hand on Leone's brother-in-law!

289367.「レオーネを どこへやった！\n お前が 城から 盗み出したんだろ？:
Where is Leone? You stole her from the castle,
didn't you?

289368.「王妃に……聞いてみるんだな……ぐふっ！: You'll have to ask the queen... gghh!

289369.「お帰りなさいませ。こたびの 反乱の鎮圧。\n 勇者アシュレイの 武勲として\n:
Welcome back. Your heroic efforts to suppress
the rebellion. Hero Ashley will be remembered
for his valiant deeds for many years to come.

289373.「トランブル将軍の 部下が\n 城内の 隠し部屋に移しました。:
General Trumbull's men moved them to a hidden
room in the castle.

289375.「遅かれ早かれ 彼らは 蜂起したでしょう。\n すべては 運命の導きだったのです:
Sooner or later they would have risen up. It
was all a stroke of fate.

289376.「国家の うみを出し切る よい機会でした。\n 多大な犠牲を 払いましたが 部族:
It was a good opportunity to get rid of the swell of the nation. It cost us dearly, but we were able to flush out and exterminate the
tribal naysayers.

289377.「これで ようやく 本当の意味での\n 部族の統一が かないましょう。\n 強き:
With this, we will finally be able to unite
the tribes in the true sense of the word. O
mighty king. All of this is your achievement.

289378.「お…お前が 妻でなくば\n ひねり殺しているところだ。:
If you weren't my wife, I'd be twisting you to
death.

289379.「自らが引き起こした 人間同士の殺しあい……。\n アシュレイの負の記憶は これ:
Killing each other's humans, caused by himself... this is what Ashley's negative memories were about. And even his wife
betrayed him... poor guy.

289380.「アシュレイを 深い闇から\n 救い出してやりましょう！: Let's bring Ashley out of the deep darkness!

289381.「あなたが 転生の園に入るのは\n 初めてでしたね。ここは 天星郷で\n もっと:
You were the first to enter the Reincarden.
This is the most sacred place in Heaven.

289382.「天寿を まっとうした 天使の魂は\n この花園の土に還り そして……\n 転生:
The souls of the angels who have lived out their natural lives return to the soil of this garden, and... reside in the Rebirth Flower,
awaiting their birth.

289383.「今を生きる 私たちの身体は\n 祖先の魂を受け継ぐ 器に過ぎない……。:
Living in the present, our bodies are merely
vessels that carry the souls of our
ancestors...

289384.「と言っても 私をふくめ 誰も\n 前世の記憶なんて これっぽっちも\n 覚えて:
However, no one, including myself, remembers a
single thing about our past lives.

289387.「……迷惑をかけて すまなかった。\n 二度と あのようなマネはせぬ。:
I'm sorry for the trouble I caused you. I will
never do anything like that again.

289388.「もし また 正気を失い\n 暴れるようなことがあれば……そのときは\n ためら:
If you ever lose your mind and act out again,
don't hesitate to finish me off.

289390.「歩き回るくらいなら 大丈夫だ。\n 息抜きに この辺を出歩くことは\n 許され:
I'm fine with just walking around. I'm allowed
to walk around here for relaxation. You can't
go out to the monastery, though.

289391.「……見ろ。同胞が 生まれるぞ。: Look. A newborn is on the way.

289392.「お帰りなさい。我らが同胞 モシュネー。\n この時代 天星郷で出会えた よろこ:
Welcome back. My fellow Moshnay. May we share
the joy of meeting in this age of Heaven.

289393.「末永く すこやかであることを 願う。\n ルティアナ様の ご加護が あらんこと:
I wish you a long and healthy life. May the
blessings of Lutiana be with you.

289394.「新生した天使は ああして\n 取り上げた者が 名付け親になる……。:
The newborn angel will be the godfather of the
one who took it away...

289395.「私の名付け親は お姉様なんです。\n 大好きで 大切な名前です。:
My godmother is my sister. I love and cherish
this name.

289396.「勇敢であれと 天星郷に伝わる 勇士から\n 名前をもらったのだが……幼い頃のユ:
She was named after a brave warrior in Heaven,
but as a child, Yuliza cried a lot at night...

289397.「お おやめください お姉様！\n この人の前で 本人も覚えてないような\n 昔:
Please stop, sister! I can't believe you're
revealing things from the past in front of him
that he doesn't even remember.

289399.「さて……息抜きは これくらいにするか。\n 近くに 私が療養に使っている 部屋:
Well...so much for relaxation. There is a room
nearby that I use for recuperation.

289400.「込み入った話は そこでしよう。\n いろいろ 聞きたいことも あるだろう。:
Let's talk about the details there. I'm sure
you have many questions.

289402.「先代の勇者アシュレイには あなたという\n 盟友がいた……。でも ぼくには……:
The previous Hero Ashley had you as an ally...
but I have no ally to fight with me.

289403.「たった ひとりで 大魔王ヴァルザードを\n 倒せだなんて……できるわけないよ！:
There is no way I can defeat the Great Demon
King Valzard by myself!

289404.「巫女の血をひく お母様は 神の預言を\n 授かったと はしゃいでいるけれど 何:
My mother, who has the blood of a priestess in her veins, is excited that she has received the prophecy of God, but to force everything
on me... it's too much.

289405.「いまだに ぼくは 勇者のチカラに\n 目覚めていないのに……。: I'm still not awakened to the power of Hero...

289406.「チカラがほしい！ 勇者のチカラが！\n ぼくだって 誰にも 死んでほしくない！:
I need my power! I want the power of Hero! I
don't want anyone to die!

289407.「ゼドラ王国の 王子として\n すべての民を 守りたい！:
As prince of the kingdom of Zedra, I want to
protect all my people!

289408.「なんなんだ この光……。\n わきあがるような チカラを感じる。\n こ これ:
What is this light I feel a penetrating power.
Is this the power of Hero?

289411.「あなたは もしや……レオーネなのですか？\n 大魔王ゴダの呪いで 石にされたと:
Are you, by any chance, Leone? They say she
was turned to stone by the curse of the Great
Demon King Goda.

289412.「俺が 石に……？\n 大魔王ゴダの 呪いだと？:
I'm turned to stone? Cursed by the Great Demon
King Goda?

289413.「そうです。あなたは 勇者の盟友として\n 大魔王ゴダと 勇敢に戦いました。\n:
That is right. As an ally of Hero, you fought valiantly against the Great Demon King Goda. But due to a curse placed on you by the Great
Demon King...

289414.「ちょっと 待ってくれ。\n め…盟友？ なんだ それは…………。: Wait a minute. Ally? What is that...

289415.「今のは レオーネの過去……。\n 彼の石化を解いたのが 次代の勇者だとは\n:
Now that's Leone's past... and how fate has
played a prank on the next Hero to break his
petrification...

289416.「いえ……考えるのは あとにして\n 今は 先を急ぎましょう。:
No...let's think about it later and move on
for now.

289417.「レオーネが処刑台に！？ いったい 何が……。\n 星導課の記録にも 記されてい:
Leone is on the executioner's block! What in
the world happened... is not even recorded in
the Star Guidance Department's records!

289419.「大魔王ヴァルザードは 滅んだ！\n しかし 皆に愛された 勇者アジールは\n:
Great Demon King Valzard has perished! But
Hero Azir, loved by all, returned as a cold
swollen body.

289421.「大罪人レオーネが 殺害したからである！！:
For it was the great sinner Leone who murdered
him!

289422.「この者は じつの兄である 勇者アシュレイを\n 憎悪していた。しかし 建国王の:
This man actually hated his brother, Hero Ashley. But the days of the Founding Kings are long gone, and there is nothing he can do to
avenge his grudge.

289423.「その晴らせぬ恨みを アシュレイの子孫たる\n 我が子 アジールに向けたのだ！:
He turned his unredeemed grudge against
Ashley's offspring, my son Azir!

289424.「卑怯にも 大魔王を討ち果たした 直後\n 満身創痍の 我が子を どさくさにまぎ:
He cowardly killed my child in the confusion, wounded in his wounds, right after defeating the Great Demon King! Falsely claiming he died
in battle!

289426.「夜ごと 息子の霊が 枕元に立ち\n 無念を晴らしてくれと 母に訴えるのだ。:
Each night, her son's spirit stood at his
bedside and pleaded with his mother to release
him from her regret.

289427.「我が子の無念 今こそ 晴らそうぞ！\n ゼドラ王国 女王ゼーナピアの名において:
My child's vengeance, now let it be avenged! In the name of Queen Zenapia of Zedra, I sentence the great sinner Leone to be
executed!

289430.「私は 導きの天使。\n 英雄の魂を 天星郷へと導く者だ。:
I am the Guidance Angel. I am the one who
guides the souls of heroes to Heaven.

289431.「生前の功績 および その資質が評価され\n そなたは 英雄と認められた。:
For your achievements and qualities during
your lifetime, you have been recognized as
heroes.

289433.「そう。そなたは 死を迎えた。\n しかし 導きに応じれば 来たるべき日に\n:

289434.「……生まれてこなきゃ よかった。: I should never have been born.

289441.「お守りの中に 石と化す呪いの札を\n 仕込んでおいた。双子の勇者に 与えるのだ:
